selected_quotes: Pre-registered lab study: Violent videogames don't increase aggressive inclinations
Pre-registered experiment finds no effect of playing violent video games on aggressive inclinations
Preregistered study finds no effect of violent video games on aggression by @RandyJMcCarthy et al.
Glad to see preregistered work in this area. Hats off
No evidence playing violent video games leads to temporary increase in aggression

citation.title: Does playing video games with violent content temporarily increase aggressive inclinations? A pre-registered experimental study

news.title: Violent Video Games Don't Cause Gamers to Stick More Pins in Voodoo Dolls
news.summary: Nitropen/DreamstimeA widely reported analysis by the American Psychological Association's Task Force on Violent Media reviewed 170 studies on how playing violent video games might affect aggressive tendencies in gamers.

news.title: How Bad Journalism Promotes Moral Panic About Media Violence: The Example of the Lancet
news.summary: Professor of psychology, media effects researcher and author of speculative fiction.

facebook.title: Does playing video games with violent content temporarily increase aggressive inclinations? A pre-registered experimental study
facebook.summary: No evidence playing violent video games leads to temporary increase in aggression https://t.co/1TmlVT6Ht3

wikipedia.title: Video game controversies
wikipedia.summary: Video game controversies are societal and scientific arguments about whether the content of video games change the behavior and attitudes of a player, and whether this is reflected in video game culture overall.
